name: Temple Imperium (caszadhuum)
description:
Temple Imperium is a wave based first person shooter set in an Aztec temple where you must lower pylons and kill all enemies before the wave ends to prevent the generator from exploding!

Controls

Fire - LMB

Aim - RMB

Sprint - Left Shift

Ability One - E

Ability Two - R

Jump - Space

Design & Production -Josh Baker

Programming - Eddie Brooks, Ase

Art - Birmingham City University 2019 Year One Game Art Students
